BR.name: Kingdom's Item Shop
BR.description: Kingdom's Item Shop é simulador de gestão de uma loja de itens no Universo de um RPG de fantasia. Você é o novo dono da loja de itens. O objetivo é gerir a propriedade e torná-la a loja de itens mais populares do Reino. Para ser um proprietário popular, irá precisar de explorar masmorras para adquirir ingredientes, encontrar novas receitas de composição, compor e vender itens para os necessitados. Enquanto faz aventuras ao ar livre, o seu velho e fiel 'Mr. Butler' pode receber os pagamentos na loja por si. Não tenha medo e motive-se a construir a sua própria loja de itens!

CA.name: Kingdom's Item Shop
CA.description: Kingdom's Item Shop is a game that simulate running an item shop in a Fantasy Role-Playing Game Universe. You are the new owner of the item shop. Your target is to run your property and make it the most popular item shop of the Kingdom. To become a popular owner, you need to explore dungeons for ingredients, find new composition recipes, compose items, and sell items to whom in need. While you do outdoor adventures, your old faithful 'Mr. Butler' can receive payments for you. Fear not and step up to build your own specific item shop!

MX.name: Kingdom's Item Shop
MX.description: Kingdom's Item Shop es un juego en el que simulas llevar una tienda de objetos en el universo fantástico de un juego de rol. Eres el nuevo propietario de una tienda de objetos. Tu objetivo es hacer de tu negocio la tienda de objetos más popular del reino. Para lograr destacar, deberás conseguir ingredientes explorando mazmorras, encontrar nuevas recetas, realizar objetos, y vender los artículos a quien los necesite. Y no te preocupes, mientras estés fuera de aventuras, el viejo y fiel 'Mr. Butler' puede recibir los pagos por ti. ¡No lo pienses más y abre tu propia tienda de objetos!

US.name: Kingdom's Item Shop
US.description: Kingdom's Item Shop is a game that simulate running an item shop in a Fantasy Role-Playing Game Universe. You are the new owner of the item shop. Your target is to run your property and make it the most popular item shop of the Kingdom. To become a popular owner, you need to explore dungeons for ingredients, find new composition recipes, compose items, and sell items to whom in need. While you do outdoor adventures, your old faithful 'Mr. Butler' can receive payments for you. Fear not and step up to build your own specific item shop!
